member.name: T:SourceCode.Clay.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionRetryOptions
member.summary: A property bag to hold various connection retry options.

member.name: P:SourceCode.Clay.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionRetryOptions.ConnectRetryCount
member.summary: The number of reconnections attempted after identifying that there was an idle connection failure. This must be an integer between 0 and 255. Default is 5. Set to 0 to disable reconnecting on idle connection failures.

member.name: P:SourceCode.Clay.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionRetryOptions.ConnectRetryInterval
member.summary: Amount of time (in seconds) between each reconnection attempt after identifying that there was an idle connection failure. This must be an integer between 1 and 60. The default is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:SourceCode.Clay.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionRetryOptions.ConnectTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error. The default is 30 seconds.

member.summary: Attempty to fill the provided buffer with (at least) the specified number of characters.

member.name: M:SourceCode.Clay.Data.SqlParser.SqlCharReader.FillRemaining(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Fill the provided buffer with as many characters as are available, from the given offset.
member.param: The offset in the buffer from where to start filling.
The number of characters filled. This may or may not fill the rest of buffer depending on whether the source is empty.
